For the love of live.


Client:
Live Nation / Ticketmaster


Work:
Global Digital


Live Nation are the largest entertainment brand on the planet. As their global agency of record for digital for over 6 years we create some of the highest traffic sites in the world – for Live Nation, Ticketmaster and a huge range of venues, festivals and associated businesses.
From Little Mix to Download Festival, Back Street Boys to K Pop, new artists in Japan and rap legends in London we help connect fans to the music and artists they love.

Request a case study

Festivals

The biggest events of the summer.
The biggest sites in the world.

We’ve been getting music lovers through the gates of every major festival around the world for a long time. With a deep knowledge of building stable platforms, enabled for huge traffic spikes, we’re proud to be a partner of choice for the best parties in the world.

39,000
concurrents

Download Japan Go-Live

31,000
concurrents

Robbie Williams Tour On Sale

Listings

If it’s on, we’ve got it covered.

Taking sites with vast, ever changing content and making it easy to search and discover the shows you love is a hard won experience. We create intuitive UX and flexible content management designed to get fans to the front as quickly as possible for some of the biggest names in the music industry.

Venues

For big halls and intimate clubs.

Every venue is different. Be it a huge arena or a tiny club, we develop brands and digital experiences that bring the venue to life and platforms that make it easy to engage, search and get tickets. From austere Australian theatres to classic Glaswegian legends we help to fill floors.

More than music

Supporting the business in music business

Worldwide recruitment, experiential and sponsorship, PR and media platforms, new artist support and discovery; our work takes us backstage and beyond.
